purpose: Facilitate the creation and conversion of OpenAPI definitions and LLM function schemas for developers
principle: Utilizes TypeScript to provide tools for generating, validating, and converting OpenAPI schemas, supporting integration with LLMs
reusability: Offers a TypeScript library that can be integrated into Node.js applications for OpenAPI schema management and LLM function composition
limitations: Primarily focused on TypeScript and OpenAPI, may not support all LLM frameworks or languages
name: openapi
description: OpenAPI definitions, converters and LLM function calling schema composer.
highlight: Comprehensive toolkit for OpenAPI definitions and LLM function schema composition
